intro: Calcitrapa pallescens, commonly known as the pale sandwort, is a low-growing perennial plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of North America. Calcitrapa pallescens is often found in disturbed areas and is adapted to withstand drought and extreme temperature fluctuations.
